Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長
Entry.EnglishText: Manager

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: ナカコ鉱石？ ああ。 今ではあまり見ない鉱石だよ。 あの鉱石がどうかしたのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Nakako ore? I know of it. It's an ore you don't see much of these days. What do you need it for?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、実は……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you see...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なるほど。 その少年を救うために ナカコ鉱石が必要なのか。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I see. You need it to save that little boy.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、あれは珍しい 鉱石だからな……
Entry.EnglishText: But, it's such a rare ore...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの知り合いなら、 鉱石を持ってるヤツが いるんじゃないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't there anyone you know who might have some lying around?

Entry.JapaneseText: 頼むよ工場長、教えてくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Please, Boss, tell us!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>...

Entry.JapaneseText: これを持って行きなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Take this with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……ナカコ鉱石!?
Entry.EnglishText: This is...Nakako ore?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ナカコ鉱石は加工が難しいから、 扱いには気をつけるようにな。
Entry.EnglishText: Nakako ore is difficult to process, so handle it with care.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとうございます。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがなかなか 言う事を聞いてくれなくて 大変だが、一生懸命やっとる。
Entry.EnglishText: I've been having problems with the Gajuma not listening to me, but I'm doing my best.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、 心配せんでくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry about a thing, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちは大変ですが、 なんとかやっております。
Entry.EnglishText: Things are rough here, but we'll manage.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>の事、なにぶんにも よろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for watching out for <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナから聞いたよ、 クレアさんという娘さんは おまえの知り合いらしいな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard from Selena that you're acquaintances with a girl named Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、メチャクチャな娘だが、 あの娘のおかげでなんとか うまくいきそうだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: While she's a bit reckless, she was able to help us work things out.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ少し賃金などの事で もめてはいますが、 メドはつきそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: There are still some disputes over things like wages, but things seem to be getting back on track.

Entry.JapaneseText: お知り合いの娘さんには 大変世話になりましたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: One of your acquaintances was of great help to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 元気でやってるか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you doing okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろんだぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course!

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場のことは気にしなくて良いから 仲間の力になってあげるんだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't need to worry about the factory. Go help your friends.

Entry.JapaneseText: みなさん、<Tytree>を よろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure <Tytree> doesn't get himself into trouble.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場のほうは順調かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Is everything going smoothly here at the factory?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、工場の修復も終わって、 ようやく仕事も波に乗り始めたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sure is. Now that the factory's finished being repaired, I'm starting to get back into the groove of things.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ、ひとつ困った事があってな。 新入りの若いのが、昨日から 工場に来ないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: But I do have one problem. One of the youngsters I recently hired was a no-show yesterday.

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由もよくわからないし、 良かったらお前から 話を聞いてやってくれないか？
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know why he didn't show up, so if you have the time, would you be willing to go ask him about it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 新入りの家は町に入った すぐのところだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The new hire's house is right by the town entrance.

Entry.JapaneseText: 年頃も近いし、おまえになら 理由を話すかもしれん…… よろしくな。
Entry.EnglishText: You might be better suited to asking him about it because you're about the same age. I'm counting on you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が行っても謝るばかりで 理由を教えてくれないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I go, they just apologize to me without explaining why.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな事があったのか…… どおりで工員たちに 落ち着きがないと思ったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: So that's what happened... It's no wonder that the factory workers were so on edge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場を私物化するなんて…… ガップラには、後でたっぷりと お灸をすえさせてもらうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Utilizing a room in the factory for his own selfish needs... Gapra's going to get an earful from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: これで新入りも大丈夫だな。 本当にありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: Now the new hire should be able to return to work. Thank you very much.

Entry.JapaneseText: 面倒をかけてすまない。 新入りの事を頼んだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry for troubling you. I'm counting on you to find out what's wrong with the new hire.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレに鉱石を見せてくれたのって 工場長だったんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: You were the one who showed me that ore, weren't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。 あの時はまだお前も小さくて 目をまん丸にして驚いていたな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. You were so little at the time and your eyes widened with amazement.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私がお前にしてやれるのは こんなことくらいだ…… 早く少年を助けてあげなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: This is about as much as I can do for you... Please save that boy, quickly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く行って、少年を 助けてあげなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Please hurry and save that boy.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
